    orientation: columns

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

data("rest_inspec")
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatter Plot


```{r}
rest_scatter =
  rest_inspec |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  filter(
    boro == "Manhattan", 
    score >= 20
    ) 
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
```{r}
rest_scatter |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~latitude, y = ~longitude, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    color = ~score, alpha = 0.5)
```
